text_description:
This Appart'city is a 10-minute walk from La Rochelle Train Station and 15 minutes from the Old Port and the Old Town. It offers contemporary accommodation with a seating area and an LCD TV.

The apartments and studios at Appart'City Classic La Rochelle Centre have free WiFi internet access. Some offer a private balcony and all feature a kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge.

A buffet breakfast is served at the residence and is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided. Guests can also buy drinks and snacks at the reception.

Outdoor and underground parking is possible at Appart’city and La Rochelle Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Guests may also choose to visit Ile de Ré, which is just 15 km away.
address: 8 Rue Franc Lapeyre, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Located in La Rochelle, beside Port des Minimes, this residence offers a covered, heated pool and a well being centre. It is a 5-minute walk from the Aquarium and the Vieux Port. On-site parking is available, at a surcharge, based on availability.

Each soundproofed apartment and studio at the Lagrange Appart'Hotel l’Escale Marine has a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave grill oven, a private bathroom and free WiFi. All apartment and suites are accessible by a lift.

Massages treatments are available at a surcharge and upon request. It is 1 km from La Rochelle Ville Train station, and 8 km from the La Rochelle- île de Ré Airport.
address: 36 Avenue Amerigo Vespucci, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Le Champlain is located opposite Parc Charruyer in the heart of La Rochelle. It offers spacious air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen cable TV and free WiFi.

Guestrooms at the Hotel Champlain are all serviced by a lift.

The hotel provides an express check in service and a 24-hour reception. Guests can relax in the gardens or in the hotel bar with a selection of international newspapers.

Hotel Champlain is just 5 minutes from the Old Port.
address: 30, Rue Rambaud , 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Situated in the lively Saint Nicolas district in La Rochelle, this hotel is surrounded by antique dealers, bars and cafés. It offers free Wi-Fi and a conservatory with large sofas and tropical plants.

The air-conditioned guest rooms each have a flat-screen TV with canal+ and satellite channels. Private bathrooms are equipped with a shower or a bathroom and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast featuring hot and fresh items is served daily in the conservatory. A continental breakfast can also be delivered directly to guests’ rooms. Local drinks, tea and coffee can be enjoyed in the bar.

Limited private secured parking can be booked at an extra cost, upon availability. The maximum height is 1m90 and the width of the parking spaces is about 2m.

Saint Nicolas Tower that guards the entrance to the old port is 550 metres from the hotel. La Rochelle Train Station is 700 metres away.
address: 13 rue Sardinerie, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
The 4-star Central Park Hôtel & Spa is situated a 10-minute walk from the heart of La Rochelle, within walking distance from the beach, and next to the Old Harbour. Guests can enjoy the wellness centre featuring a gym, hot tubs, sauna, hammam, massages, and beauty treatments at an extra cost.

At this modern, yet eco-friendly hotel, all rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries. The suites feature a seating area where you can relax, and some suites have a terrace with a hot tub. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available in each bedroom.

In the morning, a buffet breakfast is served. It includes local and organic products. Set in a residential area, the hotel is also a few steps from shops and restaurants.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge at the property.

Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 1.7 km from Central Park Hôtel & Spa, while La Rochelle Grosse Horloge is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 3 km from the property.
address: 4, avenue Jean Guiton, 17000 La Rochelle, France

hotel_name: Séjours & Affaires La Rochelle Les Minimes
text_description:
The Séjours & Affaires Les Minimes is located in La Rochelle, just a few steps from the harbour and only a 15-minute walk from the train station and the marina. It offers self-catering apartments and studios for minimum stays of 4 nights.

Each soundproofed apartment at the Séjours & Affaires La Rochelle Les Minimes is fully furnished and offers carpet and parquet floors, fully equipped kitchenette and private bathroom.

Beds are made before arrival and a house cleaning service is provided once a week for free. For guests coming by car, private parking is available.

The La Rochelle SNCF Train Station and Les Minimes are both just a 15-minute walk from the residence.
address: 27/29 rue Enrico FERMI, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Résidence New Rochelle is located near the marina in La Rochelle. It has an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. The beach is just 200 metres away.

Each of the Résidence’s studios has a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower, an equipped kitchen with a fridge and a microwave, and free WiFi access. Some studios have views over the marina or the swimming pool, subject to availability.

The property provides an outdoor terrace. Guests of the Résidence New Rochelle can find restaurants nearby open for lunch and dinner.

A Secure and free Bicycle parking is available within our property.

The centre of La Rochelle can be accessed in 10 minutes by bus. Private parking is available nearby and guests can access the N11 highway in 10 minutes by car.
address: 17 Avenue du Lazaret, 17000 La Rochelle, France

hotel_name: Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port
text_description:
Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is located in La Rochelle on the harbour. It offers free WiFi throughout the entire hotel.

Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is close to many restaurants and is a short walk to the historic district, the beach and the attractions of La Rochelle. From here it is easy to access the island of Ré and Oléron.

It offers comfortable rooms with air-conditioning, en suite facilities and flat-screen TV with Canal+ and Eurosport.

Breakfast is be served from 07:00 to 11:00 on Saturday and Sunday and from 06:00 until 10:30 from Monday to Friday.

Please note that when booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply .
address: 4, Place de La Chaîne et 3 rue Saint-Jean du Perot, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Located in La Rochelle, this Pierre & Vacances residence is a 5-minute walk from the Old Harbour and 300 metres from the TGV Train Station. It has a heated indoor swimming pool and a terrace.

The Pierre & Vacances Centre offers studio apartments with a lounge area and a flat-screen TV. Each studio has a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, microwave and an electric coffee-maker.

The residence is serviced by a lift and facilities are available for guests with reduced mobility.

The Residence Pierre & Vacances Centre is an ideal base for discovering La Rochelle and guests can enjoy a boat trip to the Île de Ré and Fort Boyard. The beach is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Subject to availability, paid parking is available upon reservation and for an extra charge.

Please note that the swimming pool is open from 09:00 until 19:00 daily.
address: 14, quai de Marans, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Ideally set in the historic La Rochelle, this 17th-century building overlooks the old harbour. Hôtel De La Monnaie is decorated by artworks and features a terrace and a wellness centre. The parking on site is limited and available upon request.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hôtel De La Monnaie offer views of the indoor courtyard or the old city encircled with fortifications. Each has a TV and free WiFi, tea/coffee making facilities, and a private bathroom.

Wellness centre is only available upon request.

Guests can have a drink at the bar and enjoy breakfast in the quaint living room, the sunny courtyard or in the privacy of their room.

The central location of the De La Monnaie hotel allows guests to stroll in the pedestrian streets and discover the many local restaurants, and the nearby market selling regional products. Private parking is available at an additional cost for guests arriving by car.
address: 3 Rue De La Monnaie, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Located in the heart of La Rochelle, just a 10-minute walk from the train station and right next to the harbour, Hôtel Le Rupella offers en-suite rooms with free WiFi access and a desk.

All rooms at Hôtel Le Rupella also have a flat-screen TV as well as a private bathroom fitted with a bathtub or a shower and free toiletries. Some rooms feature a balcony.

Offering panoramic views over the harbour, the hotel’s restaurant serves traditional French cuisine. Guests can also sip a drink at the on-site bar and enjoy their breakfast in their room.

The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and is located 850 metres from the city’s Aquarium and a 5-minute drive from La Rochelle Parc Expo.
address: 1 et 3 Quai Maubec, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Built in 1646, Hotel de L’Ocean is located on the Old Port, in the heart of La Rochelle. It offers soundproofed rooms equipped with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi.

Some rooms offer a view of the Bay of Biscay and the harbour.

A continental breakfast can be served on the outside terrace, in the breakfast room or in the room.

Hotel de L’Ocean is a 2-minute walk from La Rochelle’s main tourist attractions and La Rochelle Aquarium is a 15-minute walk away. Boat shuttles to Ile d'Aix, Fort Boyard, and Ré and Oléron islands are available in front of the hotel.
address: 36 Cours Des Dames, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Situated in La Rochelle, 1.1 km from Plage Du Roux, ATHOME RESIDENCE ET SPA features accommodation with spa facilities and a fitness room. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The aparthotel has family rooms as well as facilities for disabled guests.

Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining table, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with local specialities, fresh pastries and pancakes are available. There is a coffee shop, bar and lounge.

The aparthotel features a garden and sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near ATHOME RESIDENCE ET SPA include Minimes, L'Espace Encan and La Rochelle Train Station. La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport is 8 km from the property.
address: 33 avenue du docteur planet, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Located in the heart of historic La Rochelle, this hotel is set in a 16th century building just a 5 minute walk from the Old Port and local market. Hôtel François 1er offers free unlimited WiFi and a 24-hour reception.

All room at Hôtel François 1er are spacious, and feature a design and cosy décor inspired by the themes of rock, movie, painting, graffiti or photography. They are fitted with a TV, and come with a private bathroom.

Various facilities are available at the property such as the room service, a bar lounge, and a chill out area. Upon prior request and at an extra cost, guests can park their car in the property's secure parking located in the city centre.

The hotel is within walking distance from several shops, restaurants and lively bars. Hôtel François 1er is also close to attractions such as the Aquarium, the Natural History Museum, the city's parks and beaches.

La Rochelle Train Station is conveniently located 1.9 km from Hôtel François 1er.
address: 13-15 Rue Bazoges, 17000 La Rochelle, France

hotel_name: Le Masq Hôtel Best Western Premier
text_description:
The Best Western Masqhotel is a design hotel located a 5-minute walk from La Rochelle’s Vieux Port. It offers contemporary rooms, a lounge bar and free WiFi.

Rooms and suites at the Masqhotel are air-conditioned and feature original artwork. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk and tea and coffee making facilities.

A buffet breakfast with hot and cold dishes is served each morning at the hotel. Guests are also invited to relax in the hotel’s lounge bar, which offers a large selection of drinks and free newspapers.

The hotel’s reception desk is open 24 hours a day. A laundry service and private parking are available at an additional cost.

An Eco-Label awarded hotel, Best Western Masqhotel is located 150 metres from La Rochelle Train Station and 6 km from La Rochelle Airport.
address: 17 Rue de L'ouvrage à Cornes, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Located in the heart of the city and footsteps from the old port of La Rochelle, the hotel welcomes you in a genuine 18th century ship owner’s residence.

Set between the Market Place and Verdun Square, Hotel De La Paix features 19 comfortable rooms for one to 5 people, and a warm and friendly welcome whether you are on a business trip or a family holiday. 

The hotel also offers new services like hiring of meeting rooms and Wi-Fi access in all the rooms, and the chef’s cuisine is at once creative and traditional.
address: 14 Rue Gargoulleau, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Nestled in the heart of La Rochelle and set in an 18th-century building, Maison des Ambassadeurs is just a 5-minute walk from the Old Harbour and offers a 24-hour front desk as well as a concierge service.

Featuring a high end décor, each room and suite at Maison des Ambassadeurs has an en-suite bathroom with free toiletries.

In the evening, guests can sip a drink at the piano bar or on the property’s terrace. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s lounges or along its outdoor dipping pool.

La Rochelle Aquarium and the Beach are just 1.5 km from the hotel, while Ile-de-Ré Bridge is a 15-minute drive away. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.
address: 43 rue du Minage, 17000 La Rochelle, France

hotel_name: Tour de Nesle La Rochelle Vieux Port 3 etoiles
text_description:
The charming Hotel de la Tour de Nesle is ideally placed at the heart of the old town, in front of the 2 towers at the entrance to the port.

The hotel offers comfortable rooms with simple, functional decor and free Wi-Fi internet access. Some rooms offer a view of the famous medieval towers.

Start the day with a generous breakfast in the breakfast room.

The picturesque area surrounding the Tour de Nesle is full of restaurants, shops and cafes.
address: 2, Quai Louis Durand, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Situated on the sea front, just 2 kilometres from La Rochelle’s old port, Hotel Les Brises has a panoramic view of the sea and nearby islands. It offers free Wi-Fi .
The guest rooms at the Brises are equipped with satellite TV. Private bathrooms have luxury toiletries.

Guests can relax on the large sea-side terrace with panoramic views, or enjoy a drink in the bar. Additional facilities include a lift.

Les Brises is 2 km from the centre of La Rochelle, and is next to the Franck Delmas Park.
address: Chemin de la digue Richelieu, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Hotel La Marine, Vieux Port is situated in the centre of La Rochelle on the Old Port area in front of the medieval towers. It offers non-smoking rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Some of the guest rooms offer a view of the port and others, a view of the interior, flowered courtyard. All rooms have a TV.

Breakfast is available daily and served to your room.

The area surrounding the Hotel La Marine, Vieux Port has a number of restaurants and bars, as well as the aquarium and La Coursive Theatre. A shuttle to the islands (Oléron, Ré..) and Fort Boyard is available 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. The secure parking is located 500 metres away.
address: 30 Quai Duperre, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Logis Hôtel Le Rochelois features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a tennis court. WiFi is free of charge throughout the property. There is also a hot tub with with a massage water jets bath, sauna and hammam, which guests can enjoy at an extra cost.

The rooms feature a flat-screen TV. The private bathrooms include a walk-in shower or bath tub and toilet.

The continental breakfast of French pastries, cheeses, fruit, eggs, cereals, jams, ham, honey and tea is available daily.

Logis Hôtel Le Rochelois is 5 km from La Rochelle Train Station. A limited number of free private parking spaces can be found onsite and private underground parking is available for an extra charge.
address: 66, boulevard Winston Churchill  Port neuf, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Hôtel La Fabrique offers accommodation in La Rochelle.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Hôtel La Fabrique features free WiFi throughout the property.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Paid public parking is available nearby.

L'Espace Encan is 600 metres from Hôtel La Fabrique, while Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 700 metres from the property. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 4 km from the property.
address: 7-9-11 rue de la Fabrique, 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Set in a 19th-century building in La Rochelle, this hotel is just 500 metres from the city centre and the harbour. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms with free Wi-Fi and cable TV.

Each soundproofed guest room is equipped with a flat-screen TV. All of the elegant rooms feature antique parquet flooring and high ceiling. The private bathrooms include amenities.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the contemporary breakfast room at hotel Le Manoir.

Saint-Jean d'Acre Park is 200 metres from the hotel and La Rochelle Train Station is 2 km from Le Manoir. La Rochelle Beach is a 12-minute walk away and the bus that leads to La Rochelle Airport and the train station stops near the hotel.
address: 8 bis Avenue du Général Leclerc , 17000 La Rochelle, France

text_description:
Set in an 18-century building, Hôtel Le Bord'O Vieux Port is located on a lively pedestrian street just 30 metres from La Rochelle’s Old Port. It offers air-conditioned rooms and a terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

The rooms at Hôtel Le Bord'O Vieux Port are equipped with a TV, telephone and private bathroom with shower and hairdryer.

Hôtel Le Bord'O Vieux Port serves a buffet breakfast that guests can have on the terrace during the summer.

Public parking is available nearby, at an extra cost. Hôtel Le Bord'O Vieux Port is 500 metres from La Rochelle’s train station and a 3-minute walk from the Aquarium and the Conference Centre.
address: 43, Rue Saint Nicolas, 17000 La Rochelle, France

hotel_name: Hôtel Le Transatlantique - Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle
text_description:
Located in La Rochelle, 2.5 km from Parc Expo de La Rochelle,  The hotel and catering school property is around 5 km from La Rochelle Grosse Horloge, 1.5 km from Musée Maritime de La Rochelle and 1.8 km from La Rochelle Aquarium. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from L'Espace Encan.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Continental and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle. There are also 2 onsite restaurants with a daily menu, where guests can dine upon reservation.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include The Minimes Marina, Museum of Automata and La Rochelle University. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 11 km from Hôtel Transatlantique - Lycée Hôtelier La Rochelle.
address: 1 Avenue des Minimes, 17000 La Rochelle, France
